And I will establish <S%H3559><s%> his kingdom <S%H4438><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, if he be constant <S%H2388><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%> and mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, as at this day <S%H3117><s%>.

Take heed <S%H7200><s%> now <S%H3068><s%>; for Jehovah hath chosen <S%H977><s%> thee to build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> for the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>: be strong <S%H2388><s%>, and do it <S%H6213><s%>.

Then David <S%H1732><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to Solomon <S%H8010><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> the pattern <S%H8403><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of the temple <S%H1004><s%>, and of the houses thereof <S%H1597><s%>, and of the treasuries thereof <S%H5944><s%>, and of the upper rooms thereof <S%H6442><s%>, and of the inner chambers <S%H2315><s%> thereof <S%H1004><s%>, and of the place of the mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%>;
